1187390.name: Occupy Mars: Supporter Pack: Official Soundtrack, ArtBook, Comic Book & more
1187390.description:
Occupy Mars: The Game — Official Supporter Pack includes:


  • Occupy Mars: The Game — Official ArtBook
    (200x 2-sided pages Digital version & 400x page Printable version)

  • Occupy Mars: The Game — Digital Wallpapers & Art
    (48x for Desktop & 35x Mobile - each in various screen resolutions)

  • Occupy Mars: Prologue — Digital Short Comic Book
    (Digital version & Printable version)

  • Occupy Mars: The Game OST — Official Soundtrack from the game
    (27x tracks in MP3 & WAV formats)

  • Occupy Mars: The Game — Digital Posters
    (12x vertical posters inspired by the game)

By purchasing this Supporter Pack with Digital Art Content & Soundtrack you are directly supporting the development of updates to Occupy Mars: The Game!

Occupy Mars OST — Official Soundtrack Track List:


  • 01 - Welcome to Alpha Base - by Anthony Casalena - Occupy Mars OST
  • 02 - Explore - by Anthony Casalena - Occupy Mars OST
  • 03 - A Night on Mars - by Michal Dudek - Occupy Mars OST
  • 04 - Blue Sunrise on the Red Planet - by Michal Dudek - Occupy Mars OST
  • 05 - Building a city (Daily Errands) - by Anthony Casalena - Occupy Mars OST
  • 06 - Away from home - by Michał Dudek - Occupy Mars OST
  • 07 - Failure is not an option - by Anthony Casalena - Occupy Mars OST
  • 08 - Airlock Leak - by Michal Dudek - Occupy Mars OST
  • 09 - Oxygen Low - by Konrad Pomorski - Occupy Mars OST
  • 10 - Phobos on the Horizon - by Konrad Pomorski - Occupy Mars OST
  • 11 - 2 Sols on Mars (mastered) - by Konrad Pomorski - Occupy Mars OST
  • 12 - Arabia Terra (OccupyMars) - by Albert Wu - Occupy Mars OST
  • 13 - Wild, wild Mars - by Konrad Pomorski - Occupy Mars OST
  • 14 - Raindrops - by Blarescape - Occupy Mars OST
  • 15 - Inertia - by Blarescape - Occupy Mars OST
  • 16 - Sleep Well - by Blarescape - Occupy Mars OST
  • 17 - Life on Syllan - by AFTERGLOW feat. Michał Musiatowicz - Occupy Mars OST
  • 18 - All That's Left - by Blarescape - Occupy Mars OST
  • 19 - ISS by Konrad Pomorski - Occupy Mars OST
  • 20 - Calm Space by Konrad Pomorski - Occupy Mars OST
  • 21 - Sci Fi - by Georgi Plamenov Getsov - Occupy Mars OST
  • 22 - (Bonus Track) Cinematic Music - by Anthony Casalena - Occupy Mars OST
  • 23 - (Bonus Track) Lets Occupy Mars - by Bohemian Invader - Occupy Mars OST
  • 24 - (Bonus Track) Space Ambient - by Dubrising - Occupy Mars OST
  • 25 - (Bonus Track) LongBreath by Konrad Pomorski
  • 26 - (Bonus Track) Olympus Mons by Konrad Pomorski
  • 27 - (Bonus Track) 2 Sols on Mars (remastered) - by Konrad Pomorski - Occupy Mars OST
